snippet: Some veteran teammates made sure Jordany Valdespin got the message about the Mets’ dress code after he wore a white T-shirt on a team bus to the ballpark.
abstract: Some veteran teammates make sure New York Mets rookie Jordany Valdespin gets the message about the Mets’ dress code after he wears a white T-shirt on a team bus to the ballpark.
lead_paragraph: Some veteran teammates made sure Jordany Valdespin got the message about the Mets’ dress code after he wore a white T-shirt on a team bus to the ballpark.

headline.seo: Mets’ Valdespin Is Learning From His Rookie Mistakes
headline.main: Mets’ Valdespin Is Learning From His Rookie Mistakes
